creature.title: Abyssal Maw
creature.hpnote: Has no healing surges, but you can expend yours for effects that allow the summoned creature to expend one
creature.defenses: Your defenses, not counting temporary bonuses

block.name: Snapping Jaws
block.line: Enemies grant combat advantage while in the aura.

block.name: Standard Action
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); Intelligence +3 vs. AC
Hit: 2d6 + Intelligence modifier damage. On a critical hit, the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

block.name: Minor Action
block.line: Effect: The creature either walks, steps, stands up, squeezes, or crawls.

block.name: Opportunity Interrupt
block.line: Trigger: A creature adjacent to the abyssal maw provokes an opportunity attack
Effect: The abyssal maw makes its melee basic attack against the triggering creature. This counts as an opportunity attack.

block.name: Immediate Reaction
block.line: Trigger: A creature adjacent to the abyssal maw makes an attack that doesn't target it
Effect: The abyssal maw makes its melee basic attack against the triggering creature.

block.name: Instinctive Action
block.line: If you haven't given the abyssal maw any commands by the end of your turn, its aura affects all creatures and it attacks an adjacent creature. If it can't do that, it moves its speed towards the nearest creature.
If the abyssal maw cannot attack or move adjacent to an enemy, enemies gain a +2 bonus to triggered attack rolls against you until the start of your next turn.

block.name: Symbiosis
block.line: You deal +1d6 additional damage with melee and ranged attacks against enemies in the abyssal maw's aura.

block.name: Flaming Body
block.note: 2, or 3 while the balor is bloodied
block.line: Any enemy that starts its turn in the aura takes 10 fire damage, or 20 fire damage while the balor is bloodied.

block.name: Lightning Sword
block.line: Attack: Melee 3 (one creature); +32 vs. AC
The attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20
Hit: 6d10 + 11 (crit 3d10 + 71) lightning damage.

block.name: Flaming Whip
block.line: Attack: Melee 5 (one creature); +30 vs. Reflex
Hit: 2d10 + 10 fire damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends). The balor pulls the target up to 5 squares to a square adjacent to it.
Miss: The balor pulls the target up to 2 squares.

block.name: Fire and Lightning
block.line: Effect: The balor uses Flaming Whip once, and Lightning Sword once.

block.name: Beheading Blade
block.line: Attack: Close blast 3 (enemies in the blast); +32 vs. AC
The attack can score a critical hit on a roll of 15 to 20
Hit: 6d10 + 11 (crit 5d10 + 71) lightning damage.

block.name: Death Burst
block.line: Trigger (nonaction): The balor drops to 0 hit points or less
Attack: Close burst 10 (creatures in the burst); +30 vs. Reflex
Hit: 6d10 fire damage.
Miss: Half damage.
Effect: The balor and its equipment discorporates.

block.name: Variable Resistance
block.line: Trigger (free interrupt): The demon takes acid, cold, lightning, or thunder damage
Effect: The demon gains resist 20 to the triggering damage type or types until the end of the encounter, or until it uses Variable Resistance again.

block.name: Ranged Sneak Attack
block.line: The halfling slinger deals additional +1d6 damage against any target it has combat advantage against when making a ranged attack.

block.name: Sniper
block.line: A hidden halfling slinger that misses with a ranged attack remains hidden.

block.name: Dagger
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +4 vs. AC
Hit: 1d4 + 1 damage.

block.name: Sling
block.line: Attack: Melee 1 (one creature); +6 vs. AC
Hit: 1d6 + 3 damage.

block.name: Stone Rain
block.line: Effect: The slinger makes three sling attacks, each with a -2 penalty to the attack roll.

block.name: Second Chance
block.line: Trigger (Immediate Interrupt): The halfling is hit by an attack
Effect: The attacker must reroll the triggering attack roll and use the new result.
